question.sentence: My uncle doesn't read a lot, and nor does my aunt.
My best friend hasn't phoned, and nor has my girlfriend.
My father isn't good at sport, and my brothers aren't either.
The computer isn't working, and nor are the lights.
My cousin can't swim under water, and neither can I.
We don't have lots of parties, and nor do our neighbours.
I won't have anything to eat, and neither will my friend.
We couldn't understand it, and our teacher couldn't either.
